DOC.brief_summary: Preliminary data indicate a protective effect on the development of duodenal polyps by coxib treatment. The hypothesis of the present study is that normal therapy doses of rofecoxib for 1 year would stop or reverse the development of premalignant adenomatous lesions in the duodenal mucosa of FAP patients.
DOC.brief_title: Coxib-inhibition of Duodenal Polyp Growth in FAP
DOC.criteria: FAP patient with previous colectomy and confirmed polyposis Pregnancy Malignancy NSAID hypersensitivity
